text:
I would start with a new Theme based on the HubSpot Boilerplate. The Option is available in the Design-Manager under File > New (â€¦)

Theme Development Introduction:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-themes>

There you can see how HubL work. Its very similar to other Template Languages, like Twig(PHP).

For your Work, pls check the Documentation:

Operators & Expression Tests:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/operators-and-expression-tests>

Filters:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters>

Functions:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions>

Variables:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/variables>

Default Modules:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/default-modules>

Regards; Mitja
